2013-12-27 00:00:00 +0800

sumup $PATH: function sumUpString(str, separator){ var sum = {}; var list = str.split(separator); for(var i in list){ if(!list[i]) continue; if(!sum[list[i]]){ sum[list[i]]=1 }else{ sum[list[i]]++ } } return sum; }
